ygData.subject: Telepathy: Hah
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok... Telepathy, thats not all... Here is what mobs/any npc does: They always know where you are.  There is no way to escape a mob without zoning.  Mobs are
ygData.messageBody:
Ok... Telepathy, thats not all... Here is what mobs/any npc does:


They always know where you are. There is no way to escape a mob without
zoning. Mobs are faster than PC's. Mobs can hit a PC from a greater
distance. Mobs are more resistant to magic. Mobs have more HP than the
average PC of the same level. Mobs do more damage than the average PC of
the same level. Mobs are impossible to capture when they are running away
(Ever wonder why there are so many trains in some dungeons? Mobs run away
and PC can't catch em, and the mob goes and gets 40 other mobs). Mobs have
twice as much mana as a PC of their level. Mobs have faster casting times.
MOBS HAVE MORE FRIENDS. It is much harder to resist a mob's spell. If a
mob is using a fast weapon that does less damage then the mobs fists, it
uses the SPEED of the weapon and does the damage of it's fist. If the
weapon is slower than its fists but does more damage, it uses the speed of
its fists and the damage of the weapon. The list goes on! IS THIS FAIR?
IS THIS RIGHT? WE CAN'T EVEN RUN AWAY! HELL, MOBS ARE THE SUPERIOR RACE!
WHY DOESN'T VERANT HAVE AN "Uprising of the MOBS" where THEY SPAWN 50 VOX'S
IN EVERY CITY! Why doesn't verant just BAN us ALL and play with the MOBS?
Heck, they don't complain!

Im sick of this BS and thats why I'm quitting. Go ahead, flame me, do
whatever, I don't care. I've transcended this game that is supposed to be
"Fun".

Darkblade,
Moving to a game like Shadowbane ( http://sb.drtwister.com ) , where he
can CRUSH people instead of "MOBS" that are ridiculously more powerful than
himself.
